example.name: autogen1
example.text: Often , Mr. Dinkins 's procrastination prevented him from having a say in the way things turned out

example.name: autogen2
example.text: The new breed of team owner , Mr. Jones included , has been fighting the NFL bureaucracy for a greater say in league affairs
